mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REPORT (RE_SEQ, RE_SEND_ID, RE_TARGET_ID, RE_DETAILS, RE_OPTIONS, RE_REG_DT, RE_MOD_ID, RE_MOD_DT, RE_DEL_YN, RE_CHECK_YN, RE_TYPE) VALUES ((select MAX(R.RE_SEQ) +1 FROM REPORT as R), #{myID}, #{reportUserID}, #{reportDetails}, #{reportOptions}, NOW(), NULL, NULL, 'N', 'N', #{reportType});
